Bureau of Justice Statistics: Figure 12. Prisoners released in 30 states in 2005 who were not arrested in the remainder of the follow-up period, by year after release
Report title: 2018 Update on Prisoner Recidivism: A 9-Year Follow-up Period (2005-2014)    NCJ 250975
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection, 2005–2014.
Authors: Mariel Alper, Ph.D., and Matthew R. Durose, BJS Statisticians; Joshua Markman, former BJS Statistician
Figure 12. Prisoners released in 30 states in 2005 who were not arrested in the remainder of the follow-up period, by year after release
Note: Estimates after year-6 are not presented as 3 years of subsequent arrests could not be measured. See appendix table 12 for estimates and standard errors.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2005 data collection, 2005-2014.
